response.overview: This is a film that I made in two months about six friends. You see them at home; the way they live, the way they bathe and shower. It's also about my life. Six short portraits on the way I approach my friends. What they say is not that important, as these are private conversations in a relaxed atmosphere. The music in the film is that of my friends or groups. The two members of my girl band The 3 Pussy Kisses are also part of the film with a long song that I sing, Oh What a Wonderful World. Manfred, Martina, Hans, Andrea, Birgit, Matthias are the stars.
response.title: Friends in Frankfurt
